sect3.title: Config files
sect3.para: There are numerous configuration files for the C shell. Examples of these are /etc/csh.cshrc, /etc/csh.login, ~/.tcshrc, ~/.cshrc, ~/.history, ~/.login, ~/.cshdirs, /etc/csh.logout, ~/.logout and ~/.logout. More information on these files can be found in the tcsh(1) man-page.
